experience.title: Founding Member - UAE Chapter
experience.description: OPUS is an Opportunity Community dedicated to unlocking the full potential of the next generation of business builders around the world. We believe that community is the ultimate catalyst for opportunity, and we strive to connect exceptional young leaders through our omnichannel platform. Our community is built on a foundation of inclusivity & diversity, bringing together carefully selected individuals who are exceptional in their talent & ambition. Our mission is to be the greatest connector of people and creator of opportunity in the world.

experience.title: Founding Partner
experience.description: NISAI - Women in Alternatives, founded in 2022 by women working in Private Equity is a nonprofit community of women with similar values and views who are working in the Alternatives Investment space and the direct investment sectors across the Middle East.The aim of NISAI is to share, support, mentor, and impart learnings from the sector in the region passed onto the next wave of women in investments across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain & Oman. Our vision will be supported by networking forums, round tables, social events, advocacy and collated research with the view for the next generation of women in this sector to interact, learn from and connect with some of the most impressive women in the region. NISAI and itâ€™s events are kindly sponsored by some of the largest financial institutions in the region to promote more women on Boards, the SMT and the Investment Committee respectively

experience.title: Middle East Representative
experience.description: Eastbourne College is a leading boarding and day school for pupils aged 13-18. There are a number of key themes that shape and inform everything that happens at Eastbourne College. They may be observed in the day-to-day operation of the school, in the relationships between pupils, parents and staff and most importantly in how young Eastbournians develop into confident, able and responsible individuals who make life-long friends while at the College.Pupils thrive in this welcoming and purposeful environment, enjoying all the benefits of the Collegeâ€™s stunning location on the edge of a safe town, within minutes of the sea and the glorious South Downs.We work hard to provide the best possible pastoral support. Pupils and their families are known and feel known; every individual is valued; strong relationships are nurtured.The College provides a full education that is so much more than the excellent academic results its boys and girls achieve year after year. Both boarding and day pupils are given every opportunity to achieve across the board: academically, in the creative arts, on the sports field, as individuals and in groups.
